info.description: Access LiveBy's entire suite of hyper-local data through our custom API to create or enhance your own products.
info.title: LiveBy Hyperlocal Content API

tags.name: Boundaries by location
tags.description: GeoJSON shapes that represent different types of boundaries.

tags.name: Local Content Datasets
tags.description: A set of data that pertains to a specific GeoJSON boundary.

get.description: Get a list of insights that real-estate agents have submitted on a page.

post.description: Get a list of schools in the boundary.

get.description: Get detailed data on an individual school.
Get demographic-related information on an area.

post.description: Get a list of points of interest within an area.
Get a list of housing market-trends for an area.

get.description: Get detailed data on an individual point-of-interest.
Get detailed data on an individual event.

post.description: Get a list of events in an area.
Get environmental information on an area.
Get demographic information on an area.
Get crime statistics and information on an area.
Get commute-time and frequency information on an area.

get.description: Returns a single boundary for the LiveBy boundary ID you provide. Boundaries at this endpoint include: school district boundaries (unified, secondary, and elementary), urban areas, zipcodes (non-census), cities, and neighborhoods.
Geographical boundaries derived from Census data.

Geographical boundaries derived from Census data. Returns a single boundary that matches the GeoID you provide, with the exception of zip codes (which have a separate endpoint). Supported GeoID census boundary types: blocks, block groups, tracts, public use microdata areas, counties, states, and county subdivisions.

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: The GEOID of the census block

get.description: Non-census geographical boundaries, searchable by location (lat,lng,radius), zipcode, city, or state.

get.summary: Geographical boundaries derived from Census data.

summary.example: Snow (6–9 in.) and windy starting in the afternoon.
Snow (9–14 in.) and windy starting in the afternoon.

text.example:
This is a neighborhood of well maintained homes.  The homes are modest.  However, there is evident pride in their ownerships. 
They are very close to a local grocery store, within walking distance.  And a large park is less than a mile away with indoor and outdoor tennis and a very nice swimming pool

PointsOfInterest.description: Sets of points of interest like local businesses, landmarks, or local parks.

text.example: CAPM Classroom Training in Lincoln, NE

iCert Global is the one of the leading authorized professional certification training provider all over the globe. The CAPM certification offers recognition to practitioners who are starting a career in project management as well as project team members who wish to demonstrate their project management knowledge.  We are registered partner with Project Management Institute, scrum Alliance, IASSC, ASQ and AXELOS to provide customized pre exam professional training and coaching classes.
 iCert Global 4 day CAPM Exam Prep Boot Camp training package includes 

4Day Classroom Training
23 Contact Hours (23 PDUs)
Study Guide to the PMBOK Guide, 6th Edition
High Quality e-Learning Content   180 days free access (worth $199)
2 CAPM Simulation Tests
CAPM Exam Tips, Techniques and Mock test
100% Money Back Guarantee
Interactive Case Studies & Chapter-wise Exam Tips

  Visit iCertGlobal-CAMPTraining for any queries or future Certified Associate in Project Management workshop dates. Please contact us john.miller@icertglobal.org or call us at 713-518-1852.   Other Training Courses 1. Project Management Professional (PMI-PMP Training) 2. Lean Six Sigma Green Belt (LSSGB Training) 3. ITIL Foundation (Information Technology Infrastructure Library) 4. PMI- ACP (Agile Certified Practitioner) 5. CBAP (Certified Business Analysis Professional) 6. CCBA (Certification of Capability in Business Analysis) 7. Agile & Scrum 8. CSM (Certified Scrum Master) 9. CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker) 10. Prince2 
Special offer for corporate, group and individual references so please contact us for more details   Use Promo Code – ICERT20 to avail 20% of discount on all our above training courses 
Once you register with us, we will enable the access to our e-learning and exam simulators post successful registration.
Looking  forward for your registration with us.  Contact Us : iCert Global LLC E-mail: john.miller@icertglobal.org Website: www.icertglobal.com Call Us Now: +1 (713)-518-1852

html.example:
iCert Global is the one of the leading authorized professional certification training provider all over the globe.
The CAPM certification offers recognition to practitioners who are starting a career in project management
as well as project team members who wish to demonstrate their project management knowledge.

We are registered partner with Project Management Institute, scrum Alliance, IASSC, ASQ and AXELOS
to provide customized pre exam professional training and coaching classes.


iCert Global 4 day CAPM Exam Prep Boot Camp training package includes

  • 4Day Classroom Training
  • 23 Contact Hours (23 PDUs)
  • Study Guide to the PMBOK Guide, 6th Edition
  • High Quality e-Learning Content 180 days free access (worth $199)
  • 2 CAPM Simulation Tests
  • CAPM Exam Tips, Techniques and Mock test
  • 100% Money Back Guarantee
  • Interactive Case Studies & Chapter-wise Exam Tips



Visit iCertGlobal-CAMPTraining for any queries or future Certified Associate in Project Management workshop dates. Please contact us john.miller@icertglobal.org or call us at 713-518-1852.
